unnormalised: Arrey yaar, this Mumbai weather is so unpredictable! Yesterday, 23/10/2024, the IMD said it would be sunny, but at 4:30 PM it started raining like crazy. Had to take shelter under a bridge near Dadar station for almost an hour. Hope today, 24/10/2024, their forecast of 30 degrees C and clear skies is actually right, otherwise my Diwali plans at Marine Drive are going for a toss!
normalised: Arrey yaar, this Mumbai weather is so unpredictable! Yesterday, twenty third October two thousand and twenty four, the I-M-D said it would be sunny, but at four thirty P-M it started raining like crazy. Had to take shelter under a bridge near Dadar station for almost an one hour. Hope today, twenty fourth October two thousand and twenty four, their forecast of thirty degree Celsius and clear skies is actually right, otherwise my Diwali plans at Marine Drive are going for a toss!
